pageContent: Objective: In this study, we investigated if outness is more a situational or a consistent characteristic in gay, bisexual, and other men who have sex with men (GBM) treated for prostate cancer and how the disclosure of sexual orientation impacts provider discussions of sexual side effects.

metaData.source:
Osteoporosis risk and interest in strength training in men receiving androgen ablation therapy for locally advanced prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15748224/
